content.div: Longhorn PHP is returning for 2023! Held in Austin, TX, the conference runs from Nov 2 - Nov 4, with a tutorial day on Thursday, followed by two main conference days. We are a community-run conference for PHP developers in Texas and beyond. We are excited to bring PHP developers from all backgrounds together again for three days of fun and education. We are currently accepting talk and tutorial submissions. While the CFP is open, we also have our Blind Bird tickets available for sale. Register today!. Follow us on Twitter, Mastodon, or signup for emails at longhornphp.com to get notified with important conference updates.
